card.name: Assault
card.description: If your opponent has equal or more monsters than you, give an ally monster +1 {{ATK}} and {{KW:HASTE}}.

description.now: If your opponent has equal or more monsters than you, give an ally monster +1 {{ATK}} and {{KW:HASTE}}.
description.prev: If your opponent has as much or more monsters than you on the board, give a monster {{KW:HASTE}}.
